name: Paradigm
description: Paradigm is a surreal adventure game set in the strange and post apocalyptic Eastern European country of Krusz. Play as the handsome mutant, Paradigm, whose past comes back to haunt him in the form of a genetically engineered sloth that vomits candy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7 Processor: 2 GHz (Dual Core) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/10 Processor: Intel Core I3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB dedicated graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: mouse
